/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling construction site in Beijing, China. Dominating the center of the frame is a tall building, its curved facade reaching towards the hazy sky. The building is enveloped in scaffolding, a testament to the ongoing work. The street on which it stands is lined with blue barricades, a common sight at construction sites, adding a splash of color to the scene. In the distance, other buildings peek through, hinting at the urban landscape that surrounds this site. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the building, emphasizing its height and grandeur. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of activity and progress, characteristic of a city in the throes of development.
